attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they are houses and flat that no one lives in around newham and i have 2 kids that as been on the waiting list and they got told that they well have to wait 4years befor they well get any think and now they  and my self have been told that they can wait up to 10 years so now i want to get this out in the open because this is a joke

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
